title: Add Note
config_screen: Configure the settings for the plugin
file_path: Select the location where you would like the text to be written to
file_name: Enter the name of the file you would like to write to.
name_entry_info:
In order to add the date/time to the name of the file,
 use brackets ({ and }) to indicate following this example: 
 my_file_{yyyy}-{mm}-{dd} {HH}:{MM}:{SS} 
will become my_file_2024-09-14 22:49:21.
Individual parts of this will work.
template_entry_info:
Escape characters and normal mark down syntax will work.
 Please indicate where the text should go by using {text}.
 A complete list of escape characters and .md syntax
 can be found online.  Escape characters of an already 
saved template will not be displayed in the box.
template: Enter the template for the text you would like to write to the file.
desc_prepend:
Prepend will put the text you enter at the beginning of the file
 and push the rest down.
desc_append: Append will put the text you enter at the end of the file.
desc_override:
Override will replace the contents of the file
 with the text you enter.
